sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react" import "./style.css" import Breadcrumb from "../components/common/breadcrumb" import axios from "axios" import cookie from "js-cookie" function Detail(props) { const [productInfo, setProductInfo] = useState({}) const [Review, setReview] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { let form = new FormData() const product_no = props.match.params.id form.append("product_no", product_no) console.log(product_no) axios .post("/api/v1/product/detail", form, { headers: { Authorization: cookie.get("token") } }) .then(response => { if (response.data.status === "success") { setProductInfo({ ...response.data.data.product }) if (response.data.data.review) { setReview(...response.data.data.review) } } }) }, []) const statusHandler = status => { let statusTag if (status === "REJECT") { statusTag = 승인거절 } else if (status === "WAIT") { statusTag = 승인대기중 } else if (status === "ALIVE") { statusTag = 판매중 } else { statusTag = 판매중지 } return statusTag } return ( <>
{/* */}
{productInfo.style}가이드 {statusHandler(productInfo.status)}

{productInfo.en_name} {productInfo.zn_name}

    {productInfo.price ? productInfo.price.map(item => (
  • {item.hour} 시간 USD 66.50 CNY 66.50
    • )) : ""}

  • 지역 서울
  • 여행스타일 액티비티/액티비티/액티비티
  • 평점 4.2
